document_data.name: Donnabella Fiasco
document_data.mainbody: '''Donnabella Fiasco''' was a [[spellcaster (class)|spellcaster]] who lived in the region of the [[Sword Coast North]] near [[Phandalin]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: While she preferred to spend her time studying or reading, rather than being around other people, Donnabella believed that everyone had the spark of [[magic]] within them. To her it was just a matter of discovering it and bringing that ability to the surface.
document_data.Abilities: Donnabella sought to join one of the Realms' prestigious schools of wizardry.
document_data.Possessions: She wore a [[unicorn]] mask made from [[papier-mâché]] that she felt enhanced her magical abilities.
